context_bundle.summary: Git push to main fails with 403 - branch protection or permissions

onboarding.quick_start: Create feature branch, push there, create PR to main

root_cause.branch_protection: Main branch has protection rules requiring PR
root_cause.token_scope: Git credential may lack push permission
root_cause.org_policy: Organization may require signed commits or reviews

solution.merge_via_pr: Use GitHub UI or gh pr merge

check_protection.common_rules: Require PR, require reviews, require status checks
